properties.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Jefferson, AL; Shelby, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:26AM CST until February 14 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights Affecting Bibb...Jefferson and
Shelby Counties.

.Levels are falling along the upper Cahaba River near Cahaba
Heights but are expected to rise again due to additional rainfall
expected during the next 24 hours. A flood warning is now in
effect for the Cahaba River near Cahaba Heights.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights.
* from Thursday morning to late Thursday night...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 7:30 AM Wednesday The stage Was 7.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 14 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by tomorrow late morning  and
continue to rise to near 14.1 feet by Thursday afternoon.
The river will fall below flood stage by tomorrow early afternoon.
* Impact...At 14 feet...Minor flooding occurs in the Cahaba Heights
area.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
